Received one with different lighter colors. Red is close to magenta, orange is
like neon orange, yellow is like lime yellow, green is flourescent, and blue
is a light blue.  
  
The cube is made of good quality plastic and is ok smooth but this is not for
professionals. Good for beginners and amateurs.  
For the price, this is a great beginner-intermediate cube.  
  
The cube also makes a wind-chime like sound when rotated.

An excellent cube for a beginner to mid-level pro solver. Has excellent turn
speed and smoothness. I have tried many speed cubes and stickerless cubes
before, however, they did seem a bit too large for my taste. This cube is, in
my opinion, is at a perfect size to performance ratio. I have fairly large
size hands (I'm 6ft high). Although it did take a bit of time to get used to
the small cube, coming from years of using large cubes, was fairly easy.  
  
Pros :  
Smooth turning  
Perfect size for any size hands  
Very little to No maintainance  
  
Cons :  
The logo of the manufacturer is a bit distracting (It's on the centerpiece of
the white face)  
  
Verdict : Although there is only one major con that I can point out with the
cube, it is fairly easy to remove the logo with a razor blade and 5 minutes of
work. If you are looking to getting into speed solving, or just solving in
general, this is a very good place to start off.

Worth its price  
Nice speed and swift in motion

Nice but costly. I bought the exactly same item from local market for Rs 95/-
only. Very smooth, tough plastic, high speed and lovely soft colors. I don't
know why the seller is selling it with a double price, and delivery cost
extra.

After using it for 1 month now , I have found it to be a good quality rubix
cube for Learner's. Now let's talk about it's pros and cons.  
Pros : Made of high quality and durable plastic which feels good and fast in
hand.  
Cons : There is nothing really bad about this cube but you might get
frustrated while learning to solve it 😂

I wanted to a buy 3X3 cube since long since I lost the branded cube that I
bought one year back. When I checked same piece at a mall, I noticed that it
costed more than 330 per piece. That's when I saw this brand listed on amazon
for 160 per piece, almost 50% of the mall rate. But then I had a doubt that it
might not last. Honestly, this cube is much more easy to use and convenient.  
Two things I noticed:  
If you zoom in, you will see that pieces around the center piece have rounded
corners. This design actually helps in moving pieces faster. This feature I
didn't see in the mall bought.  
Also the plastic feels durable and still light. Few I have noticed to have
either thick plastic, which are hard to use or ultra thin, breaking easily.  
  
This is the right cube for a starter. So, go for it. Btw, I bought one more
after using one.

Best Negi Cube

RS Negi Speed Cube 3x3x3 - Smooth, Fast, & Durable  
  
Date : 6th November 2016  
  
Bought on June 2015  
Writing this review after more than 1 year of usage.  
  
The product came covered in a plastic wrap, not in any box as shown in the
picture.  
The cube was pre-lubricated.  
  
PROS  
\- As the name says its a real speed cube, it turns easy and fast as far as it
is properly lubricated.  
\- Sticker-less, so no worries about color fading.  
\- Tile-less, so no worries about tiles getting off the cubes.  
\- Colors are so bright & vivid.  
\- Easy to dismantle and re-assemble.  
\- Easy to clean.  
\- Spring tension can be adjusted by taking the cap off the centre cubes,
though the caps never got off while cubing.  
\- Cubes never or very rarely got off while cubing.  
\- Tough & shock resistant, I have dropped it so many times, and still its as
good as new.  
\- No sharp edges.  
\- Good quality plastic used.  
  
CONS  
\- A bit smaller than the standard Cube, RS Negi is 55x55x55mm while standard
one is 57x57x57mm (though many say that 55 is also a standard size). Even
though its just 2mm per side, you can feel that when you hold it.  
\- Small catches & lock-ups, but in acceptable range.  
  
OVERALL  
\- Best for practising ! Best for beginners !  
\- Value for money speed cube, I got it for Rs.142  
\- I have ordered 7 more cubes for my friends, after using my first RS Negi
Speed Cube for around 1 week.  
  
If you find my review helpful, please click YES below, that would encourage me
to do more reviews :)  
Happy Shopping !

The smoothest cube at the best price

review:
Hi guys, right now I'm here with a review of 'RS Negi 3x3 Stickerless Speed
Cube' .  
  
First of all, I wanna say that this cube is really an amazing one. I'm really
liking this cube for many features which resemble the famous Chinese DaYan or
MoYu cubes. I'll mention all those features under Pros. I'm really loving to
play and practise with this one.  
By the way, at this price, the cube is really a very good and fun stuff.  
  
Now, heading to the.....  
  
|Product Description| :-  
  
This cube comes in a thin plastic wrapper only with a price and mfg tag on it.
This cube is made up of lightweight plastic and is very colourful and shiny.
It has a "Negi's" logo on the yellow centre piece. Well, it also comes in a
little pre-lubricated condition. Its design exactly resembles the famous
Chinese 'MoYu HuaLong' cubes' stickerless versions. Not only designs, but
there are many more interesting features, which will be discussed next under
Pros and Cons.  
  
Anyways, lets get into the Pros and Cons.....  
  
| Pros | :-  
  
1) It is naturally a speed cube. If customized properly and maintained from
time to time, it will work at Storm speed.  
2) The screws of center pieces are adjustable, as well as, easy to adjust.  
3) Spring tensions of this cube is really good.  
4) It is completely stickerless. Even no tiles. All pieces are moulded
colourful plastics.  
5) Turning is quiet smooth, even without lubrication.  
6) Interlocking technology of cubicles is pretty good, which prevents popping
out of pieces. Also corner twisting is very rare in this cube.  
7) It is pretty lightweight and doesn't feel like a load on fingers.  
8) Easy to disassemble.  
9) The edges of pieces are straight slanted which helps in corner cutting.  
10) Price is really cheap when these features are considered.  
  
| Cons | :-  
  
1) Its not very durable. Indeed it is weak as strength of plastic is not that
good.  
2) It doesn't have its original packaging. Only comes in a thin wrapper and
that's disappointing !  
3) The brand logo is painted with a really cheap paint. Wears off and vanishes
within a few days.  
4) Sometimes it causes serious inaccurate moves, if there's even a little
decrease in speed while continuously doing some Algorithms.  
5) It doesn't come in a good pre-lubricated condition. It is very little
lubricated, right after unboxing from package.  
6) This cube gets stuck/jammed sometimes.  
7) Corner cutting is not as desired of a good speed cube.  
  
(#) | Additional Pro Tips | :-  
  
i) Apply silicone oil lubricant thoroughly throughout the cube and joints for
maintenance and speed. Don't forget to clean the dusts and dirt before
lubricating.  
ii) Adjust the spring tensions from time to time.  
iii) Avoid rough usage of the cube and hence by doing all the above the
problems of this cube can be solved and hence it will have a long life.  
  
Thank You, for giving your valuable time to read this long review !  
  
If you find it helpful, please let me know ( by hitting the 'Helpful' Button
), so that I'll feel glad to write other reviews to keep helping customers.



 Its really nice and fast you can go for it I HAVE SO MANY CUBES BUT THIS IS
THE BEST IN BUDGET nothing is bad its fast,smooth,glossy finished, AND NAGIS
IS A GOOD AND TRUSABLE BRAND and the main thing that the logo of nagis get
erased at very first day PLEASE SEE THE VIDEO IN MY REVIEW!!!!!!!***$

RS Negi Speed Cube 3x3x3  
  
\- Great Quality ;  
\- Sticker-less Cube ;  
\- Smooth and lubricated ;  
\- Value for money ;  
\- Easy to disassemble too , you’d need to turn the top layer at 45 degree and
twist one of the edge and take it out – the remaining pieces will come out
easily. Or you can check instructions for the same on google as well.  
\- The colors on this cube are : White x Yellow , Orange x Red , Green x Blue
;  
\- The white center piece has a logo of RS Negi on it ;  
\- The lubrication reduces with time and it doesn’t remain as smooth as it
used to be in the beginning. There are lubricants available in the market ,
but they are expensive ;  
\- Delivery was quick but it doesn’t come with any instructions/manual nor a
box ; just wrapped in a clear plastic cover and a hologram on top.  
  
Hope this helps . Happy Shopping !!  
  
~ The SilverLining Review ~

It's Speed & Amazing Cube.  
  
Previously I had purchased one before for my nephew in local shop for about
50/-. It got broken, So had to opt out for this purchased during Lighting deal
for about ~115 Rs. I can assure that it's complete worth the price.  
  
# It's fast and cube move around smoth.  
# No cheap plastic.  
# No Stickers around. It's stickerless.  
# Very good for beginners.  
  
Word of Wisdom: There are tons of Videos out there on Youtube about How to
solve Rubik's cube. My nephew is 6 year old. Even though he is not able solve
it completely sometime. It's helping me lot. Also you can check out dis-
assemble & assemble videos. Soon I will add here, If I'm able to do it. So I
suggest you give this as gift for Kids. Instead of letting them to Stare TV
all the time.  
  
It's worth the price hand down, be sure checkout during deals, You might get
it for below 100 Rs/-. I bought it with Prime account so even though it's
around 100 Rs/- I got with free shipping.  
  
Cheers!

Excellent cubes..but quality issues. I ordered three. Two were fine and one
had two chips missing. So Amazon sent me a replacement which is fully
scratched which I am guessing was a previous return from some other customer.
Since it works i am not returning it again. However a bit disappointed by the
QC checks. But for the price cant compain much. Definitely buy it without
thinking much. Same cubes under other brand names are being sold at higher
prices

This cube is suitable for mid level cubers. It's very smooth and corner

yellow side and the spring sound could've been reduced to some extent.(Though
it isn't much audible)Worth every penny.
